BLAru220.Transcription:
Leuer is þe wrenneAbouten þe schowe renneÞan
                    þe fiþel drautOþer þe floute craf
BLAru220.Note:
Folios in manuscript have been renumbered and the folio numbers here
                    refer to the most recent numbering.
BLAru220.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 2.107.
Sisam,  Celia,  and  Kenneth Sisam, eds.  
             The Oxford Book of Medieval English Verse.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1970: 553.
